entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Burgeo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:06 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burgeo 03:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 6.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 6.1°C
Wind: SSW 44 km/h gust 62 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Temperature rising to 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain at times heavy this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except 20 cm inland. Rainfall amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Fog patches. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
